attributes.action: make english university fees free to all students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English universities should be free so that all English students have the oppurtunity to attend university without the worry of coming out with endless debts. University is extremely expensive and the consequences of the expense means that young adults do not have appropriate education. These people are the next doctors, lawyors, engineers and even the next prime minister!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
